data.text:
Urge your senators to pass the #ForThePeopleAct and end unjust voter suppression once and for all.

Make your voice heard now: https://t.co/OEIF8rvftq
https://t.co/AhRbRnbUnu
Celebrate Star Wars Day, you must. I miss celebrating with my former Jedi mates in space. Wherever you are in the world today, #MayThe4thBeWithYou https://t.co/245VD9JE3E

Everyone deserves a fair shot to participate in our democracy. This bill ensures that equity-- that’s why it’s called the #ForThePeopleAct, and we need to pass it into law.

https://t.co/JySno201tL

Michael Collins as Command Module Pilot for #Apollo11 was the best spaceflight assignment ever made. His grace, humility & professionalism made him perfect for the historic role and cemented his legacy. 

I enjoyed the few moments we shared together. #RIP, @AstroMCollins. https://t.co/SpxZ3Ua80i
I’m all in on Wahl Street. Put me in, Coach! https://t.co/ZbkLLtAS95
Every day is #EarthDay even in space! https://t.co/JvnyMPJ0XR
And above all, teamwork! Some feats are only impossible if we go alone. It is when we work together, we achieve great things. #MarsHelicopter https://t.co/FDdXgja0xE

This is an important event to help the planet! Join @Elonmusk & @PeterDiamandis  launching the $100M XPRIZE Gigaton CARBON Removal.  List, ask question, start a team. RSVP at https://t.co/tekVVpnh2N https://t.co/OgL7ta2Nnp
This.  https://t.co/4k5MO7S0bn

Congratulations to my former ISS crew mate Shannon Walker on taking command of the @Space_Station today! She was on the ISS when I arrived for my 1st long spaceflight, and she taught me much about how to be a good station crew member. 

She will be an outstanding Commander! https://t.co/njvNtn5thD
RT @NASA: April 12 is the International Day of Human Space Flight. 60 years ago, Yuri Gagarin had his first historic flight into the cosmos…

RT @NASA: #OTD 40 years ago, the first space shuttle mission lifted off with @NASA_Astronauts John Young and Bob Crippen aboard.

With 10 y…
I can, mostly. https://t.co/WmU1hb1oXu

Being part of something larger than oneself was one of the most rewarding things about flying in space—in the name of science and for humanity. 

Today, I’m fully vaccinated, and it feels great to be a part of something larger than myself again. #vaccinated https://t.co/AMXYE9mLGA
Spring has sprung! #firstdayofspring https://t.co/5eOTspXrls
The only holiday I never celebrated in space. May the luck of aurora be with you! Happy #StPatricksDay https://t.co/Uf6CdhyYr6

Great to talk with my good friend and Rock radio Hall of Famer @daynasteele for her #rockstarprinciples podcast recently.

I shared insights from my 520 days in space as well as what music I played for my few crew mates on Friday nights aboard the ISS. https://t.co/NysOSeZHtj

Signed copies of my books are all now available from my local independent bookstore @TatteredCover here in Colorado for a limited time only.  Pick yours up today before they're gone! 

Non-personalized copies are available to order here: https://t.co/3faqXIl5zn https://t.co/dscD4rDFw3

5 years ago, I returned home after a year in space and began my reintroduction to normal life on Earth by following the science. 

Today I have a similar sense of anticipation on getting back to normal. 

Stay the course, trust the science, and we will get there again together. https://t.co/0MZ1WbnGBr

For a limited time, YOU can go solar with Sunrun with a special discount! Use the unique link below to get a $500 Visa gift card upon installation! https://t.co/b893027kF1 

#sponsor

After living more than 500 days aboard the International Space Station--using energy from the sun--I am excited to partner with @Sunrun to power my home here on Earth! 

Why? Hear how the unique vantage point of space inspired me and my wife, @amikokauderer, to go solar! https://t.co/Aw9g1qYlvM

RT @knowablefyi: We’re talking live on Twitter Spaces with @StationCDRKelly about his Knowable course, space, and more.

Monday 2/22 at 130…

Through perseverance, we can land limitless possibilities even when a destination is as far as Mars. 

Go for landing, @NASAPersevere! #CountdowntoMars https://t.co/svdNm7Ktaa
Leadership Tip: Don’t abandon ship and leave your crew behind during a catastrophic emergency. https://t.co/TYT6xshw1H
Love on Earth. May we see it. May we be it. #ValentinesDay https://t.co/zO3y7aIfWk
@johnkellytweets @SIRIUSXM The first.
I think I resemble this comment. But who am I to judge? https://t.co/3dgxMzrz6Y https://t.co/BgvKRweX9w

Hey, kids! —
Today is #WorldReadAloudDay. What better way to celebrate the power of reading than to invite you to join me on IG Live as I read my new kids book #GoodnightAstronaut! 

Join me for my live reading followed by Q&A tonight, 8 p.m. ET | https://t.co/haHQYQfyhD https://t.co/X90F146TYg

Go for launch! 

When I was in space, I sent a goodnight wish every night to all back on Earth. 

Now on Earth, I’m excited to share a goodnight story in my new kid’s book I hope will inspire the littles to dream big & reach the stars!#GoodnightAstronaut https://t.co/haHQYQfyhD https://t.co/sYiWh1m4Iy
My new kid’s book #GoodnightAstronaut launches tomorrow! Order here: https://t.co/haHQYQfyhD https://t.co/zzuDvcle42

If you think you know, #ThinkAgain. Looking forward to reading my friend @AdamMGrant’s new book that encourages us to unlearn assumptions and stay curious, so we may explore and discover more—to be released tomorrow! https://t.co/r1xQvPYyWl
If you’re interested in justice, check out @PreetBharara’s new podcast. Favorite quote, “It’s never too late to fix something that’s wrong.” https://t.co/5VKrWUAL6u
From 17,500 MPH to 5 MPH. Looking good! https://t.co/3s5cKLmkgy

Remembering Apollo 1, Challenger and Columbia crews, friends and colleagues who sacrificed their lives in the name of science, space exploration and discovery. Honoring them and their families today and always. #NASARemembers https://t.co/u96R8cBxn7

if I'm going to learn, I must do it by listening—Larry King

Was honored  to be interviewed by @kingsthings while I was in space for my yearlong mission. He was a master at his craft—a leader—because he knew not to assume he knew everything. #RIPLarryKing https://t.co/mPy1izCStt
I was ten years old when Hank Aaron eclipsed Babe Ruth’s record. It’s my earliest baseball memory. But mostly I will remember him as a pioneer for civil rights. #RIPHankAaron https://t.co/YRmtINrB3s

#FlashbackFriday Returned from space to the steppes of Kazakhstan after my six-month mission. 

Felt the burn on re-entry. But then landed in a blizzard. https://t.co/aebdimomKf
Democracy prevails! https://t.co/Lc564WOHUZ

Just got my new children’s book today! #GoodnightAstronaut 

Launch date: Feb 2! More details to come. https://t.co/VdyJ7qbfUJ
The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy — Martin Luther King Jr. #MLK https://t.co/4kdpOXah9G
Moral courage. https://t.co/4iTkdwDzP3
This is probably worth watching. https://t.co/8wzbpprFY2
RT @amikokauderer: Finished @DanRather’s book What Unites Us—profound all around—but I keep returning to this passage that resonates with m…
RT @FBI: The #FBI is still seeking information to help identify individuals who actively instigated violence on January 6 in Washington, D.…

As a leader I never wanted my crew mates to follow me, I wanted them to follow principles like empathy, integrity, accountability, honesty, courage, etc. 

When you attach your ego to a person—and the person fails—your ego goes with it. https://t.co/tBuvafrpIg
Hmm...maybe. https://t.co/iQ1GZpINV9

but also with our irresponsible words,” I’m sorrowed once again in light of the recent violence at the Capitol where 5 killed & this time my brother’s life and many others’ were threatened. 10 years later, and here we are. We are better than this. 

Let’s prove it.

10 years ago today, my sister-in-law, @GabbyGiffords, was shot, 6 killed & others injured in Tucson, AZ. I was in space. Listening to my statement then on “the unspeakable acts of violence and damage we can inflict on one another. Not just with our acts, https://t.co/1ztmkYY8Tz
RT @SenMarkKelly: In America, we have fair elections and peaceful transfers of power; democracy prevails over chaos; and those who commit v…

If you’re struggling with isolation during the holidays this year, I know the feeling. That’s why I’m partnering with @sanvellohealth, an app with day-by-day guides on how to feel better. Download it for free for a little extra help. #SanvelloPartner https://t.co/lGEwljySFI

Christmas Eve, 1968. Merry #ChristmasEve2020! 

Goodnight, Moon. #GoodNightEveryone! https://t.co/9oxYZKze9L

When I felt isolated on the space station I reached out to loved ones. This holiday season many are feeling the same way. 

Connect with those who are alone, especially older adults, and encourage them to check out @AARPFoundation’s https://t.co/9BEzdRQEGg #sponsor https://t.co/8WKQV9Kr02

The 1st coronavirus vaccine was given in the U.S. earlier this week, offering a glimpse of light at the end of this dark tunnel.

It’s something to celebrate. But let’s not let down our guard. Stay safe, keep social distancing and #MaskUpAmerica! https://t.co/rELc98ccFp

RT @amikokauderer: Wishing our family, friends & all who celebrate a Happy Hanukkah from our home to yours. 

May the warmth and glow of ea…
Congratulations to my friends and former colleagues! Got room for one more? https://t.co/TnCp1Kjgkb

Iconic Test Pilot General Chuck Yeager has slipped the surly bonds of earth. A WWII fighter ace and the first human to break the sound barrier. 

He was a true legend with the right stuff. Fair winds and following seas, General Yeager. #RIPChuckYeager https://t.co/1MxJA8enFU
Congratulations to the 2020 Breakthrough Junior Challenge winner!! Sal Khan and I surprised the winner at school with the life-changing news. Check it out! https://t.co/umd2yRkI1j

Great leaders admit they're not perfect. 

I teach this in my Knowable course - https://t.co/psV2Me5rpe - and I'm happy to learn that it inspired Knowable's CEO to start publicly sharing both the ups and downs of running his company. 

More than ever, we need authentic leaders. https://t.co/xWhhQEUhXr

Congratulations to my twin brother @SenMarkKelly. Today marks a special day for our family, but also for Arizona and our Nation. 

His objective views relying on science, data, and facts will be beneficial in confronting the myriad of challenges we all face together. https://t.co/kUeTDchUWj

Checking out a new book: Diary of an Apprentice Astronaut by my former crewmate, ⁦@AstroSamantha⁩! 

Incredible detail and great writing. I do take exception with the title, however. Because when I arrived on ISS, Samantha was far from an apprentice astronaut. Well done. https://t.co/H0GLcgctc1

Thanksgiving in space 2010 with my crew mate and friend, Shannon Walker. Thankful she is back in space today for her second Thanksgiving in space ten years later. Happy Thanksgiving, Shannon! https://t.co/jjQGQr5GMw
Watch tonight! Great to share the ISS story, life and work aboard, with my former crew mate and great friend @astro_timpeake! https://t.co/0Rm3Rehqwz

1E wants to turn your daydreams into reality by giving you the opportunity of a lifetime to Work from Anywhere in the world for up to ONE MONTH, all expenses* covered for you and a friend up to $20,000!
 
https://t.co/SJCxXOz9qm

There’s been a secret war brewing against renewable energy for years, and now all the dirty secrets are in the open.  

My friend #PropertyBrothers star @JonathanScott uncovers what’s really going on and who it affects the most  #PowerTripPBS TONIGHT! https://t.co/mTmGNLkpie https://t.co/UkHz3PIROl
https://t.co/chv2mONqtR https://t.co/iO9d8D3C7n
Excited to see my friends launch into space in less than an hour! https://t.co/2qGMzkRET7

Proud to have served in the @USNavy with my fellow VF-143 World Famous Puking Dogs. 

Salute to all who have served/serving our great country. Thank you for your commitment & sacrifices to uphold our freedom & democracy. 

May we honor all veterans today and always. #VeteransDay https://t.co/S86lU9Xo76

In my new @knowablefyi audiocourse, I share the formative lessons on leadership, fear, success, and failure that changed my life. Learn to dream, lead, and achieve now at https://t.co/psV2Me5rpe https://t.co/r3zWFBMSTl

Alex Trebek was all class, all the time. Sorry to hear of his passing but I know his legacy will live on with @Jeopardy and his philanthropic pursuits. I learned so much from the show and him. He will be sorely missed. https://t.co/1UwUcHWPPM

2/2: And that if we can do this, we can do anything if we commit ourselves and work together. 

Today I am still absolutely convicted by this belief. Today despite our many challenges, we begin to build again together. https://t.co/9ZZbyvSPpE

1/2: As I backed away for my last time from the ISS—a place I lived for 500 days, a place built by diversity, with integrity & enormous teamwork—looked out the window of our space capsule at the truss and was struck with awe at how we came together & accomplished this great feat. https://t.co/ZzTm1Jt2NH

Congratulations to the guy on the left, @CaptMarkKelly! 

Guess Mom knew what she was doing when she dressed you in that suit and Senator’s bow tie.

You’re in good hands, Arizona. https://t.co/AFwf0IZwRP

Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger. Anger leads to hate. Hate leads to suffering. 
Choose wisely young Padawans
—Yoda 

#Vote https://t.co/PmhnhLiK4i
20 years ago today was the last time all humans were on earth at the same time! A remarkable achievement! Congrats @NASA and happy anniversary #ISS20. https://t.co/cmXZzTWgEn
Happy Halloween from my old haunts! https://t.co/8eJeaSdDXe
This sure puts things in perspective! https://t.co/gDQJRFaMqI

When did we subscribe to the proverb, “when the going gets tough, the tough give up?” We can defeat this virus through science and teamwork. The same way we’ve addressed other serious challenges throughout the history of this great nation. #SundayThoughts
Just put up my very first political yard sign #FullSpeedAhead https://t.co/x4nPyhRcAp
#Voted https://t.co/lA5LHP2x0H

Science is not opinion or politics.
It’s objective observation, evidence, experimentation, critical analysis, and peer review. 

It’s truth whether or not you want to believe it. 

I stand with Dr Fauci and I don’t get tired of science. https://t.co/nz0ZE8rMBh
@AstroMCollins I’m Grumpy.

Yesterday, 3M released its annual State of Science Index. 92% of people around the world agree we should follow science to contain this pandemic. We need science to solve complex problems. Learn more about this year’s survey: https://t.co/62VfLrXqAC

What you saw tonight in the #AZSen debate is the person I’ve known my entire life: thoughtful, measured, respectful —@CaptMarkKelly is the right person for Arizona and our nation. https://t.co/MAT264Vtmg

2020 has been a long year separated from loved ones – even for a guy who spent 340 days in space! If you are experiencing social isolation or know an older adult who is, @AARPFoundation can help. Find helpful resources in your area at https://t.co/5UkJCqKNWZ. #sponsor https://t.co/JhrBYiwKIS
Wishing for a speedy recovery for @POTUS, @FLOTUS, the government officials, journalists and all others affected by this most recent COVID-19 outbreak. Rest well tonight, DC. https://t.co/LII0hue43B
Things have come a long way in 4 years! That’s great! https://t.co/jqbzkJEvd4

Proud to share this amazing project from @Vaonis_fr as an ambassador. With Vespera, you’ll be able to contemplate the beauties of the night sky and take your own astonishing pictures. 

Don’t miss this opportunity. Preorder yours on Kickstarter now! https://t.co/EkyGv7I2hj #ad https://t.co/pZALI1U6yx

Tomorrow 11 AM ET — I’ll be speaking at Contec’s 1st Cleanovators Virtual Summit discussing the rigors of space & the importance of keeping things clean in a critical environment. 

It’s not too late to register for this free event so come check it out at https://t.co/YkazA6e57x

The grounds used to be much higher but still got my space cup!
#NationalCoffeeDay https://t.co/yqVGK2dhUf

As a former NASA astronaut, I am very proud to be an ambassador of @Vaonis_fr for the launch of their new project on Kickstarter. Don’t miss the opportunity to become a part of space exploration History.🪐🚀 Join here=>https://t.co/CxtUn5VJxc 
#Vaonis #kickstarter #stargazing https://t.co/OZisFWM9B1
Voting is your American duty but also your superpower #NationalVoterRegistrationDay https://t.co/8wylDlqYP0
Go Navy! https://t.co/QkFiUfcVs3

Saddened to hear of the passing of Justice Ginsberg. 

RBG was not only notorious for her intellect and dedication to civil rights but also her willingness and ability to work and be friends with others who are ideologically opposed. 

We need more of that today. https://t.co/r04eFhGW0H

Scientific methodology includes, objective observation, evidence, experimentation, critical analysis, and peer review. 

We need more science right now, not less. https://t.co/wXFdDjZex5

Science makes America great. 

As a reminder, science is the pursuit and application of knowledge of the natural and social world following a systematic methodology based on evidence. https://t.co/Vmtc58wDQv
Remembering those we lost on 9/11 #NeverForget https://t.co/rf5JGfhRVB
RT @CaptMarkKelly: I spent 54 days in space. It seems like a lot of time, but it goes by quickly. We only have 54 days left to change the d…

3. 2. 1... let the countdown begin! Join me in a few weeks as I will be kicking off the Cleanovators Virtual Summit sponsored by @contecinc!    
Register and Learn More:   https://t.co/YkazA6e57x https://t.co/QgH0eNAfJx
No. No beans! https://t.co/PqCf1xxrv5
